DOC.brief_summary: Fifty-one patient suffer chronic post-traumatic postoperative osteomyelitis low extremity include retrospective investigation . The patient assign study group combination therapy antibiotic-loaded calcium sulfate antibiotic-loaded PMMA control group antibiotic-loaded PMMA . Hematological parameter , eradication infection , rate infection recurrence reoperation rate evaluate follow-up .
DOC.criteria: The retrospective study include patient chronic posttraumatic postoperative osteomyelitis exclude patient suffer hematogenous osteomyelitis acute posttraumatic postoperative osteomyelitis . Other kind osteomyelitis .
